item.title: US economy expected to have slowed sharply
item.description: Trump's tariffs have stoked uncertainty among consumers and businesses.

item.title: Trump discusses first 100 days of historic presidency in exclusive ABC interview
item.description: President Trump issued a full-throated defense of his first 100 days in office during an exclusive interview Tuesday with ABC News.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump rallies with supporters to mark 100 days
item.description: President Donald Trump capped his 100th day in office on Tuesday with a rally in front of supporters in Michigan.
